mapper.select: select c.cart_no, c.prod_no, c.counts, c.reg_date, p.prod_title, p.prod_price, p.prod_img, p.prod_seller, p.discount_rate from cart c, product p where c.prod_no = p.prod_no and c.cart_no = #{cart_no}
select * from cart where cart_no = #{cart_no} and prod_no = #{prod_no}
mapper.update: update cart set counts = counts + #{counts} where cart_no = #{cart_no} and prod_no = #{prod_no}
update cart set counts = #{counts} where cart_no = #{cart_no} and prod_no = #{prod_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from cart where cart_no = #{cart_no}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cart_no = #{cart_no} and prod_no = #{prod_no}
